author: rcmorano
title: NFT-authorized NFT-minter contract
description: Currently there is no way to perform a decentralized, authorized, on-demand token minting from a smartcontract.
solution: Develop an smartcontract that, using specific metadata as input, mint tokens on-demand only if a governance NFT was included in the tx.
experience: DevOps advocate with over 15 years of experience. Ex-Emurgo DevOps Lead. Gimbalabs Co-Founder. Dandelion Founder and Operator.
